cinnamon.engine.utils

Interface ObservablePosition<T extends Position>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - object with position to observe.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Position
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Transform
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImageComponent, MutableTransform, Transform

    public interface ObservablePosition<T extends Position>
extends Position

    Describes a Position that allows an OnPositionListener to be notified whenever any of its components are changed.

    When a change in position has occurred, all attached OnPositionListeners are notified.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ObservablePosition.OnPositionListener<T extends Position>
      Callback for changes to a Position's x, y, and z components.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Adds an ObservablePosition.OnPositionListener to be notified on position changes.
      void removeOnPositionListener(ObservablePosition.OnPositionListener<T> listener)
      Removes an ObservablePosition.OnPositionListener.

      • Methods inherited from interface cinnamon.engine.utils.Position

        getX, getY, getZ
